endpoint_url.description: The API endpoint URL to post to; enabled by turning on the REST integration on VictorOps

routing_key.description: The VictorOps routing key, affixed to the endpoint_url to enable custom alert routing

entity_id.description: An optional entity_id to include with the update; if provided, will associate this update with an existing incident

entity_display_name.description: The display name (title) for the update

state_message.description: The body of the message for the update
